title: DEALS OF THE WEEK: Get £125 for switching bank; free cocktails
text:
Receive a £125 switching bonus if you open a Club Lloyds current account. The account is free if £1,500 is paid in each month.

It pays interest and has extra perks such as cinema tickets or a magazine subscription. Must switch via Current Account Switch Service by November 5. Visit lloydsbank.com/current-accounts.

Sip on a free Pineapple Daiquiri from Browns Brasserie and Bar

Pay £30 for a £45 supermarket shop with Tesco when you sign up to shopping website TopCashback. Visit topcashback.co.uk/tesco-sep19-tcb. Deal ends October 15.

Sip on a free Pineapple Daiquiri. The complimentary cocktail is served to customers who sign up to receive news and offers from Browns Brasserie and Bar. Visit browns-restaurants.co.uk/signup.

Get £100 cashback when booking a holiday worth £1,000 with Supercruises. Offer ends on October 31. Bookings are online only. Visit supercruises.com.
description: This week's deals include: £125 switching bonus if you open a Club Lloyds current account; a free Pineapple Daiquiri and much more.
authors: Laura Shannon For The Mail On Sunday
Some Links In This Article May Be Affiliate Links. If You Click On Them We May Earn A Small Commission. That Helps Us Fund This Is Money
